article_text: The Democrat from Florida’s Treasure Coast says he will run for the the U.S. Senate no matter what Rubio decides to do. He is the son of Thomas Murphy, owner of Miami-based Coastal Construction.

article_metadata.title: U.S. Rep Patrick Murphy is running for Marco Rubio’s Senate seat | Miami Herald

article_summary:
He is the son of Thomas Murphy, owner of Miami-based Coastal Construction.
The Democrat from Florida’s Treasure Coast says he will run for the the U.S. Senate no matter what Rubio decides to do.
